attributes.action: Give NHS the money that was promise  in Brexit election NOW
attributes.background: Support NHS with 350 millions pounds a week

rejection.details:
The Government has introduced legislation which would increase funding for the NHS by £33.9 billion a year (in cash terms) by 2023/24.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a legal commitment to a minimum spend on universal health care: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300925
